duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and execute master data maintenance, testing, reporting, and manufacturing support of SAP and associated boundary systems.
Design and maintain manufacturing data including items, specifications, lookups, recipes, routings, formulas, process instructions, and process variables.
Translate business requirements into robust data design which is compliant, efficient, and effective.
Maintain Material BOM & Recipe release process to meet manufacturing requirements and maintain compliant, efficient, and reliable batch records and supporting data.
Develop and execute cGMP change controls and change requests for master data changes.
Provide department representation on site projects.
Collaborate to maintain and optimize product hierarchy ensuring compliance and minimizing risk.
Provide direct internal customer support to various departments.
Develop and provide technical training to SAP S/4 HANA users.
Maintain an understanding of the manufacturing processes and SAP S/4 HANA.
Provide periodic on-call support to internal customers for emergent system issues.
Collaborate with site management and IT to develop business requirements for business process improvements within the global information systems.
Perform business impact assessment on changes to ERP system, boundary systems, and business processes.
Develop risk-based testing approach and manage testing execution related to the ERP system and associated boundary systems.
Support integration of boundary systems with the manufacturing execution system and/or ERP system.
Collaborate to develop and maintain site test scripts and other related testing documentation.
Understand manufacturing processes and the implementation within the global ERP and boundary systems.
Act as site project coordinator as required for new systems, enhancements to current systems, and/or required regression or other testing coordinated at a global level.
Provide support to manufacturing and supply chain in case of emergent system issues.
Perform other tasks as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field from an accredited college or university required.
